Text: thanks! I saw this in a class when I was studying psychology in the late 70's. For all who watch it, this i1967 remember. Even the worst prison hospitals are much better than this now. Th treatment of the mentally ill still needs improvement but these horrors are a thing of the past in the US. Of course I'm sure there are exceptions. Evil survives.
Been looking for this in DVD format for some time now...can someone please jump on and help seed? Thanks!
